data.comment: The match is underway at Hitachi Capital Mobility Stadium.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Gorkem Saglam (Willem II) has received a yellow card from Martin Van den Kerkhof.
The second-half is underway in Groningen.
The home team replace Joel Van Kaam with Tomas Suslov.
In the minute 63, Goal! Groningen have got their heads in front thanks to a Ahmed El Messaoudi strike.
Great play from Tomas Suslov to set up the goal.
Mo El Hankouri is replacing Patrick Joosten for Groningen at Hitachi Capital Mobility Stadium.
In the minute 82, Alessio Da Cruz is on a sub for Jorgen Strand Larsen for Groningen.
The away team have replaced Gorkem Saglam with Mats Kohlert. This is the first substitution made today by Adrie Koster.
Danny Buijs (Groningen) is making a fourth substitution, with Leonel Miguel replacing Gabriel Gudmundsson.
The match is over. Final score 1-0.
